title: 10/06/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 10/06/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to MLB Network's John Smoltz about tonight's Dodgers/Cardinals matchup. Should Major League Baseball do away with the one game Wild Card Playoff? Chris Mannix calls in to break down the Kyrie situation. Will he play for the Nets this season? Plus, Michael Silver explains his report on Urban Meyer and his relationship with Jags players.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
